nodes.text: The Rimma Trade Route was a super-hyperroute that crossed the galaxy. It notably passed through the planets Eriadu and Sullust, and intersected with the Hydian Way in the Outer Rim Territories.

Established 5,500 years before the Battle of Yavin, the Rimma Trade Route was a super-hyperroute knitted together by smaller hyperspace routes. The trade route started at the planet Abregado-rae in the Core Worlds, then weaving through the Colonies, the Inner Rim, the Expansion Region and the Mid Rim to the far reaches of the Outer Rim, ending at Kal'Shebbol. Rimma also took in the planets Sullust, Eriadu and Dagobah, and intersected with the Corellian Trade Spine and the Hydian Way.
